name: Really Simple SMS API
author: omikant, wptutorialspoint

sections.description:
Send SMS notifications when somebody submits your contact form using SMS API.

Shortcode Options

No shortcodes.

Credits

This plugin was written by WPTUTORIALS POINT Team.
sections.installation:
The easy way:

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Really Simple SMS API”
  3. Click ‘Install’
  4. Activate the plugin

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin file from this page and unzip the contents
  2. Upload the really-simple-sms-api folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the really-simple-sms-api plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

The easy way:

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Really Simple SMS API”
  3. Click ‘Install’
  4. Activate the plugin

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin file from this page and unzip the contents
  2. Upload the really-simple-sms-api folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the really-simple-sms-api plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
